<!--
If you share code:

DON'T DO:
```
function test() {
for (const i of [1, 2, 3]) {
console.log(i);
}
}
```

DO:
```typescript
function test() {
  for (const i of [1, 2, 3]) {
    console.log(i);
  }
}
```
-->
